verses.verse: Now when these things were <S%H3615>done<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, have not <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, doing according to their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, even of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%>, the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%>, the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

For they have <S%H5375>taken<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for themselves, and for their <S%H1121>sons<s%>: so that the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> have <S%H6148>mingled<s%> themselves with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of those <S%H776>lands<s%>: yea, the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> hath been <S%H7223>chief<s%> in this <S%H4604>trespass<s%>.

And when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, I <S%H7167>rent<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>mantle<s%>, and plucked <S%H4803>off<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> and of my <S%H2206>beard<s%>, and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H8074>astonied<s%>.

Then were <S%H622>assembled<s%> unto me every one that <S%H2730>trembled<s%> at the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because of the <S%H4604>transgression<s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away<s%>; and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8074>astonied<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice<s%>.

And at the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice<s%> I arose <S%H6965>up<s%> from my <S%H8589>heaviness<s%>; and having <S%H7167>rent<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>mantle<s%>, I <S%H3766>fell<s%> upon my <S%H1290>knees<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, heaviness: or, affliction

And <S%H559>said<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>, I am <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>blush<s%> to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> to thee, my <S%H430>God<s%>: for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> our <S%H7218>head<s%>, and our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is grown <S%H1431>up<s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>. trespass: or, guiltiness

Since the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have we been in a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>trespass<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>; and for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have we, our <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and our <S%H3548>priests<s%>, been <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, to <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, and to a <S%H961>spoil<s%>, and to <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And now for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>space<s%> <S%H8467>grace<s%> hath been shewed from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H7604>leave<s%> us a remnant to <S%H6413>escape<s%>, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, that our <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H215>lighten<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4241>reviving<s%> in our <S%H5659>bondage<s%>. space: Heb. moment a nail: or, a pin: that is, a constant and sure abode

For we were <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>; yet our <S%H430>God<s%> hath not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> us in our <S%H5659>bondage<s%>, but hath <S%H5186>extended<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto us in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4241>reviving<s%>, to set <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H5975>repair<s%> the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> thereof, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H1447>wall<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. to repair: Heb. to set up
And now, O our <S%H430>God<s%>, what shall we <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> this? for we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>,

Which thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H776>land<s%>, unto which ye <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is an <S%H5079>unclean<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H5079>filthiness<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, with their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, which have <S%H4390>filled<s%> it from one <S%H6310>end<s%> to <S%H6310>another<s%> with their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>. by: Heb. by the hand of from: Heb. from mouth to mouth

Now therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> not your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, neither <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, nor <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> or their <S%H2896>wealth<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>: that ye may be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and leave it for an <S%H3423>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> all that is <S%H935>come<s%> upon us for our <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>deeds<s%>, and for our <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>trespass<s%>, seeing that thou our <S%H430>God<s%> hast <S%H2820>punished<s%> us <S%H4295>less<s%> than our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> deserve, and hast <S%H5414>given<s%> us such <S%H6413>deliverance<s%> as this; hast punished: Heb. hast withheld beneath our iniquities

Should we <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and join in <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>? wouldest not thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us till thou hadst <S%H3615>consumed<s%> us, so that there should be no <S%H7611>remnant<s%> nor <S%H6413>escaping<s%>?

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou art <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: for we <S%H7604>remain<s%> yet <S%H6413>escaped<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>: behold, we are <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in our <S%H819>trespasses<s%>: for we cannot <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee because of this.
